Clinics.name: Urologist
Clinics.description: specialize in the genitourinary tract—the kidneys, urinary bladder, adrenal glands, urethra and male reproductive organs—and male fertility.

Clinics.name: Andrology
Clinics.description: medical specialty that deals with male health, particularly relating to the problems of the male reproductive system and urological problems that are unique to men.

Clinics.name: Dermatologist
Clinics.description: specializes in conditions involving the skin, hair, and nails.

Clinics.name: Orthopedic Surgeon
Clinics.description: specialize in the musculoskeletal system - the bones, joints, ligaments, tendons, and muscles that are so essential to movement and everyday life

Clinics.name: Endodonist
Clinics.description: dental specialists in diagnosing and treating tooth pain and performing root canal treatment

Clinics.name: Cardiology
Clinics.description: experts on the heart and blood vessels. You might see them for heart failure, a heart attack, high blood pressure, or an irregular heartbeat.

Clinics.name: Dentistry
Clinics.description: Also known as dental medicine and oral medicine, to diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of diseases, disorders, and conditions of the oral cavity, commonly in the dentition but also the oral mucosa, and of adjacent and related structures and tissues
